entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as the destination they are heading to. (THE MINISTRY OF MAGIC)

entities.name: escalator
entities.description: They went through an escalator at the beginning of their journey. (the escalator they went, through the ticket barrier)

entities.name: ticket barrier
entities.description: They passed through a ticket barrier after going through the escalator. (through the ticket barrier)

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as being delighted with the way the stile swallowed his ticket. (Mr. Weasley delighted with the way the stile swallowed his ticket)

entities.name: stile
entities.description: The stile is mentioned as swallowing Mr. Weasley's ticket. (the stile swallowed his ticket)

entities.name: ticket
entities.description: Mr. Weasley's ticket was swallowed by the stile. (his ticket)

entities.name: map
entities.description: Mr. Weasley refers to a map while trying to find their way. (Mr. Weasley’s contin ual references to the map)

entities.name: street
entities.description: They emerged onto a broad street lined with imposing-looking buildings. (onto a broad street)

entities.name: buildings
entities.description: The buildings are described as imposing-looking at first, but later become smaller and less imposing. (im posing-looking buildings)

entities.name: pub
entities.description: A pub is mentioned as being located on the street they reached. (a pu b)

entities.name: dumpster
entities.description: An overflowing dumpster is mentioned as being located on the same street. (an overflowing dumpster)

relationships.description: The Ministry of Magic is where they are heading to, and the escalator is a part of their journey there. (THE MINISTRY OF MAGIC ... the escalator they went)
Mr. Weasley passed through the ticket barrier after going through the escalator. (through the ticket barrier)
The stile swallowed Mr. Weasley's ticket. (the stile swallowed his ticket)
Mr. Weasley refers to a map while trying to find their way. (Mr. Weasley’s contin ual references to the map)
The street they emerged onto contained imposing-looking buildings. (onto a broad street lined with im posing-looking buildings)
A pub is mentioned as being located on the same street they reached. (a pu b, and an overflowing dumpster)
An overflowing dumpster is mentioned as being located on the same street. (an overflowing dumpster)
